ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
fortran_compiler:
- gfortran
fortran_compiler_version:
- '14'
glpk:
- '5.0'
libblas:
- 3.9.* *netlib
liblapack:
- 3.9.* *netlib
liblzma_devel:
- '5'
libxml2_devel:
- '2.14'
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version
  - fortran_compiler_version
zlib:
- '1'

about.summary: An R to C/C++ interface that runs the Leiden community detection algorithm to find a basic partition (). It runs the equivalent of the 'leidenalg' find_partition() function, which is given in the 'leidenalg' distribution file 'leiden/src/functions.py'. This package includes the required source code files from the official 'leidenalg' distribution and functions from the R 'igraph' package.  The 'leidenalg' distribution is available from <https://github.com/vtraag/leidenalg/> and the R 'igraph' package is available from <https://igraph.org/r/>. The Leiden algorithm is described in the article by Traag et al. (2019) <doi:10.1038/s41598-019-41695-z>. Leidenbase includes code from the packages: igraph version 0.9.8 with license GPL (>= 2), leidenalg version 0.8.10 with license GPL 3.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.1.36" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-leidenbase
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/leidenbase_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/leidenbase/leidenbase_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e53d949a26a5c6ffa7e4bc302b672516d35ba465611f6dd02e3ccdeda857b8a2

build:
  number: 0
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}        # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - r-igraph                         # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ stdlib('c') }}                # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ stdlib('m2w64_c') }}          # [win]
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}            # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_cxx') }}      # [win]
    - {{ compiler('fortran') }}        # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_fortran') }}  # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem            # [win]
    - {{ posix }}sed                   # [win]
    - {{ posix }}grep                  # [win]
    - {{ posix }}autoconf
    - {{ posix }}automake              # [not win]
    - {{ posix }}automake-wrapper      # [win]
    - pkg-config                       # [not win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}coreutils             # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip                   # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-igraph >=0.9.0
    - glpk
    - gmp                              # [win]
    - libblas
    - liblapack
    - liblzma-devel
    - libxml2-devel
    - zlib
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-igraph >=0.9.0

test:
  requires:
    - r-testthat
  source_files:
    - tests/
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('leidenbase')"                                                   # [not win]
    - $R -e "testthat::test_file('tests/testthat.R', stop_on_failure=TRUE)"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('leidenbase')\""                                          # [win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"testthat::test_file('tests/testthat.R', stop_on_failure=TRUE)\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/cole-trapnell-lab/leidenbase
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: 'An R to C/C++ interface that runs the Leiden community detection algorithm to find a basic partition (). It runs the equivalent of the ''leidenalg'' find_partition() function, which is given in the ''leidenalg'' distribution file ''leiden/src/functions.py''. This package includes the required source code files
    from the official ''leidenalg'' distribution and functions from the R ''igraph'' package.  The ''leidenalg'' distribution is available from <https://github.com/vtraag/leidenalg/> and the R ''igraph'' package is available from <https://igraph.org/r/>. The Leiden algorithm is described in the article by Traag et al. (2019)
    <doi:10.1038/s41598-019-41695-z>. Leidenbase includes code from the packages: igraph version 0.9.8 with license GPL (>= 2), leidenalg version 0.8.10 with license GPL 3.'
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
